Blog.post: Where did the pink go? Well, actually, it's cool... I mean, Dan put up with that pink for such a long time. So now we will enjoying having it this lovely shade of tan! Love always, Kimmy Blunt
hey dna?!!!! how did you find such a fool unuseful silly site? LOL..... really, it's os silly, but sop silly that makes us laugh!!LOL... i missed those silly things coming from you!!! lol... j/k
Eat More Chicken (for you non-spanish speakers) ;) urlLink

Folks, I just wanted to let you know that the best way to waste your time is to do something that isn't useful... but you gotta have lots of fun doing it! Honestly, I've thoroughly enjoyed the time that I've spent on urlLink The Homestar Runner Website . I've spent hours and hours looking at the urlLink Strongbad e-mails , and they're pretty hilarious. If you don't know what Homestar Runner is, then when you have free-time, just visit the website. I've watched a few of the toons, too... they're pretty good. Anyways, that's my random rambling about Homestar Runner, I hope you're a happier person for it (under no circumstances are you to ignore your friends just to watch another cartoon... only watch it when you're bored and have nothing to do...). Ok, goodbye. urlLink

Children, I just wanted to let you know that I'm back. I'm glad that Kimmy wasn't too drastic about anything. I'm glad you missed me! Anyways, I just wanted to say that I'm back, and I have nothing else to say.

I am the only one of the team members for this blog still here! I have full reign over this blogger! Such power I feel! Ha Ha Ha! I should do something, but what?!?! ugh.. I can't think of anything! hmmm, oh well.... Wish Dan and Nati were here... well, I guess I will just go now, and ummm, wait, I guess
Kimmy found this... it goes great with our website urlLink

Every new day is a gift from God. Many times, I don't realize this, and I treat a new day as an obligation, rather than a gift. If you think of today as a gift, then you will be more likely to enjoy it for what it's worth.

Did you know that I just won a free SOBE on Sunday??? It was so awesome! It said "Look under the cap to see if you have won!" And guess what!?!?! I won!!!! of course, to get my free one, I have to buy another one. How does that work? In reality, I actually get two at 50% off! hehe! I guess I will have one to share with a lovely friend! maybe I will sell it for profit! Or I might just give it to my lovely sister, Melissa! I love you Mel! Love always, Kimmy Blunt

with Natalia... We do love you, Dan, even though the color is pink... By the way, is it a fashion for the guys in Brasil to wear pink? Just wondering... Well, I had an awesome night! We all went bowling! I am really (and I mean really) bad at that game! I have so much fun playing it though! I think the highest score that I have ever gotten is like a 98! hehehe! Oh, well! I just hope that I will be able to keep my record of never breaking 100! LOL :) Well, I must be going now! I need some sleep so I won't be grumpy... hehehe I will talk to you guys later! God bless and G'night! Love always, Kimmy Blunt

Church camp is less than a week away! I'm excited, but not ready for it! I don't even know if I own enough clothes for that long away... much less have them clean!! But, if you know me, you know that I'm not even bothering to check my clean clothes, because I'm much too lazy for that. While I'm not on the topic... guys, I don't have very much money. I just thought I'd let you know that. Oh yeah, I'm hungry...

hey dan.. came oon, pink is not that bad!! it's a nice color... lol... i mean, it's fashion to wear pink nowadays here in brazil... if you don't like this shade, there's another one... lol... i know that deep in your heart you cannot hate kimmy and i.. we also love you, even having pink as the colour for our blog... lol

No, I'm not depressed. No, I wasn't fired from a job. No, my best friend didn't leave me. No, I didn't eat a stink bug. No, it's not even the fact that our blog is pink... None of that! If that happened, I would probably be alright, because things happen. No, today is the worst day of my life, because I am confused as to what day it is. It's bad enough just not knowing, but I can't figure it out whether it's Tuesday, or Wednesday. I wouldn't normally have a problem with this, but some very reliable sources tell me it's Wednesday. Anyways, kk' says it's tuesday, so I think I'll be alright. I just thought of it, but... is TODAY the worst day of my life? Or is it TOMORROW that's the worst day of my life? Anyways... ps: I'm not lovin' that whole pink thing...

ok, so I'm only joking, but PINK??!?! Seriously, you guys... this is not funny. Just so everyone knows, I had nothing to do with this... I had it a nice green. It didn't burn your eyes out when you came to the page. Am I going to have to take away some privileges?? ps: no hard feelings...

This is true! I have joined this blogger! Thanks Dan for coming up with this idea! I think it's lovely! Oh, and the color of our page, perfect! hehehe, we can change it Dan, if you would like us to. :) So, the title... SOBE yourself... myself I'll be, I'll post on here and laugh with glee! And if you believe this poem is lame, You and I will think the same. Good-night!

hey guys.. are you enjoying our new blog??? i am... i was thinking, since we are two girls and one boy, i thought it would be nioce if our blog was pik blog, isn't it kimmy???! isn't it nice??? lol!!! ps.: i guess Dan'll be lil mad at me... :op ahuahauahuahauah

...sometimes. I love technology, because I can instant message my friends. I love technology because I like to play video games. I love technology because I can send receive pictures with my friends. I love technology because I can e-mail my friends, and receive e-mails from them. I have a web-cam, and I use a microphone to chat. However, technology seems to not work as much as it should. I might think this because it decides not to work at inopportune times. Well, I guess nothing's perfect, and technology is a great thing... when it works. That reminds me... I'm hungry...
well, did you ever had those days that you don't have any inspiration to write?? well, i'm in one of those...lol... so.. there's no so then... see ya.. =)
Hey folks... here's a new group project I'm workin' on... pretty soon we'll have a couple more people on here.
Here's the group from my school that went to ISC 2002 in Flagstaff, Arizona. I was such a youngen back then... urlLink
Here's me and James on the 4th of July at Troy's house. We were just hangin' out here, waiting for the fireworks to get going. urlLink
Here's my cousin James giving a speech at his graduation. He got speech student of the year, so he got to give the speech. Oh yeah, that's real money around his neck... it was pretty cool. urlLink

Hey folks, this is my good friend Troy. He's tried to adopt me... but my parents won't let him for some reason. Troy is a really REALLY nice guy. Alright, well he's probably gonna like hit me for tryin' to suck up to him, but he's seriously really cool. urlLink

I'm not sure what I'm going to write about yet, but I just feel like writing something. If any of you like bacon, you should let me know. Oh yeah, I could talk about bacon. It's one of the most unhealthy things I know... you're basically eating the fat of the pig, yum yum! But... who likes vegetables? Isn't it kind of ironic that the things we should eat, we don't like, but the things that are bad for us, we like? I heard someone say once, "Die young, leave a pretty corpse." Well, that's my random rambling... I'll probably delete it later or something...

Hey folks, I'm finally back. This week was an awesome week for pretty much everyone at camp. Everything was so awesome, but I'm also very tired from an exhausting week. I've never seen so many people show up for early prayer... and the services were so awesome because of it. This week, I've been given a vision for my life. You see, the speaker gave some statistics about Christians, and one of them was that 95% of all Christians will never lead someone to Christ. That really bugged me, because I've never led anyone to Christ. So then, I was just praying the whole week for God to use me to lead others to Him. Then last night (Thursday), when I was praying, I was just asking God all of this stuff, like to give me courage and boldness, and a bunch of other things, and the worship leader came and prayed with me and prayed all of the same stuff that I was praying before!!! It was the most awesome thing ever! Then later in the night, a girl came and was praying for me, and she was just praying for more boldness and courage, and a couple of other things... but it all lined up with what I was praying for! Anyways, camp was really good, but I'm glad to be home! I've been so exhausted, and I want to go to bed now (in my own bed)... anyways, I'm back, and I like bacon. Goodbye my friends.
Children, I know how to play bass. I just thought I'd let you know that.

Folks, I'm leaving tomorrow morning for camp, so don't expect to see me online for a while. It shall be sad times to leave all of you, but then you can ponder how much you wish you could talk to me ;) ... or not. Anyways, it shall be joyous times as well, as I'm going to church camp. Also, I get to see a good friend of mine that I never see. Oh yes, Kimmy, I have a gift for you (I hope you like it)... 1 Corintios 13:13 Y ahora permanecen la fe, la esperanza y el amor, estos tres; pero el mayor de ellos es el amor. Con mucho amor, Dan
Alright, so I haven't been doing a countdown, but I'm excited! Camp is in 3 days! We're gonna have a blast! And it usually has good food, too...
Ok, so you might not be able to tell from there, but the eggs cover the whole skillet... but half of them are burned... it was pretty funny when I found them urlLink

I cut my head shaving last night, and it wouldn't stop bleeding! So I am still wearing band-aids... oh, it hurt so bad! Anyways, I just wanted to let you know, don't ponder how sharp your razor is, WHILE you're shaving... because you may press too hard and cut yourself. urlLink

Hey folks, Kimmy, Nati, and myself have started a new blog. If you wanna check it out, that'd be cool. So, the address is urlLink sobeyourself.blogspot.com . Oh, and by the way... I had nothing to do with it turning pink.

Ok, today is the weirdest day of my life! I think that maybe half of the world went into a time warp, and the other half didn't... I'm scared for my sanity! Today, the radio station said it's Wednesday, and my brother's clock (which is hooked up by radio to this clock that's supposed to be never wrong) said that it's Wednesday. But I don't remember living tuesday, and my computer says it's tuesday, and my little brother has soccer practice on tuesdays, but not mondays, and there was no soccer practice yesterday, AND all of my previous posts say Monday or sooner! I am going insane! Maybe I'll call my mother... ps: thanks, Kimmy!
urlLink
urlLink

Title: Size a man You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions - NAGUIB- Category: Interacting with people Title: Enemies Forgive your enemies, but don't forget their names - JOHN.F.KENNEDY -

An honest disagreement is often a good sign of progress. - M.K.GANDHI I got this from wisdomtips.com ... and I thought it was appropriate for my blog... since I have a lot of honest disagreements. Good ol' Gandhi...

Good morning people! You may think that's it's after noon, which you would be correct, but it's also morning for me! Today I got to sleep in! It felt so good... and now I have a full night's (er, morning's) rest. I have one friend online so far... and I met one of my other friend's little sister. And that is all I've done today... talked to 2 people (and my little bro at home). Maybe I should finally clean off my bed, since I long to sleep in it once more. Well, camp is 1 week from today! I'm pretty excited, but I think it'll need to be closer for me to REALLY get excited. I might buy a disposible camera so that I can have some pictures... but I don't know, I'm kind of a cheapskate. I hope the food is good...

So, I was having this argument with Christy today... and it was about something stupid, of course. And, she decides that she's right (of course...). Anyways, it hit me then, that I will never in my life win an argument with a girl. I will go to my grave without ever being able to say, "I won." I can't win w/ Kimmy, and I can't win w/ Christy (who are the 2 people I argue with the most). SO, I came up with a brilliant plan! I'm gonna go to Wal-mart tomorrow, and argue with someone I don't know! It will, of course, be a girl who I don't measure to be as quick as my friends. "Why a girl?" You might ask. Well, the answer is simple... I've won many arguments with men... that's no feat! I will triumph some female, somewhere! Ok, goodbye.

The middle girl is Christy... and we all know Kimmy (it seems like). I'll tell you what, Christy is my bestest Mexico buddy... but she's an AMERICAN... and she makes it a point to tell you that... Seriously, she's an awesome friend... who also cheated me on her quiz... j/k, Christy. Keep bein' the awesome person you are! urlLink urlLink

So, I'm back from the restaurant I was stuck at... and I'm still tired. Sorry if the audio was kinda stupid, I didn't seem to take my nap today. I promise you, sleep is good stuff. Hopefully I'll have something coherent on here... and I wanna hear what you think about the audio. Yeah, so I hope you enjoy everything. I'm kinda hungry...
urlLink
here's me being washed up... I guess I'm not as good at surfing as I thought I was... urlLink urlLink

Hopefully, I'll have a couple of voice messages put up here... maybe today, maybe not. If I can figure out how to work it, that would be so awesome. Well, I guess I gotta call it first, before I find out how easy or hard it is. Maybe it'll work the first time! Woo-hoo (maybe)

That I need to correct some common misconceptions. I'm not really 7'10" or 472 pounds... wherever you might've gotten that idea... YOU'RE WRONG! Oh yeah... I guess I need to apologize if any of you tried green eggs and ham on my behalf... I never touched the stuff. I DO, HOWEVER, LIKE BACON!!!

Just so you know, folks... I stayed up until 3:00 this morning, and I'll let you know, it's not all it's cracked up to be. Well, maybe it's because I was the only one that stayed up, or maybe it's because I was doing something constructive. Yeah, maybe if I was doing something stupid like partying... and had a bunch of friends over, it would've been a blast... ps: I acted like an idiot in church today... maybe it was the lack of sleep...
Here's a really good pic of Nati and Luna... they are best friends... and also very nice. urlLink urlLink
Here's a really cool before and after shot... I think it's fabulous... I guess urlLink urlLink
Disregard the date, please... it's pretty well wrong urlLink urlLink
again, disregard the date... urlLink urlLink

ok, disregard the date, it's totally wrong... But, you may ask yourself why I have a picture of snow on my blog. The truth is, it's a very long overdue personal favor to one of my very good friends. If that isn't wordy enough for you, I don't know what is. Anyways, sorry it took so long, Natalia... but here's the pic' I was gonna send ya... like, 20 years ago (well, maybe not quite THAT long ago...) urlLink urlLink
Here's my friend Brytt again... this time with her best friend Blake. urlLink urlLink

Hey folks... I discovered that I've posted too many things from the same event. The result? Too many things from the same event. What do you know? So, I've decided to take off many of those pictures that I've felt are non-essential. Obviously, if you were on here before, and now wonder where certain pictures have gone... I'm in the process of removing them. This is to provide better customer service and lower prices to our valued customers (blah, blah, blah)...
This is my oldest brother Mark and his fiance Judy... they're getting married in October, I'm so excited! urlLink urlLink

Here's Kimmy (a.k.a. Dr. Blunt) and KK' (a.k.a. "The oops girl"). Kimmy is a california girl, and she'll let you know it! Kimmy's just all-around an awesome girl, who apparently is going to Brazil before I do. Keep havin' fun, and don't forget about that cool snow cloud! KK' is one of the funniest girls I know... she'll never let you go without a good laugh. She calls me Uncle Oops, so if you see me with that sn, now you know why. urlLink urlLink

Jaime is one of the first people that I met at Internationals, over 2 years ago. He's the reason I know so many awesome Brazilians. Not only that, but he's one of the very most awesome people I know... he's from Paraguay, but he's been in Brazil for a while. Many of you probably know him, and you're better off if you do! Anyways, that's Jaime in a nutshell. Then there's Natalia... when I first met her... I thought she hated me, and she thought I hated her. It's kinda funny now that we look back... especially how close we've gotten. We are so alike, it's scary! Well, not really scary... but very cool. Like, all the things we think at the same time... and all the stuff that we both like. Anyways, it's like Natalia is another me, only a girl... or maybe I'm another Natalia, only a boy... who knows? But, if you don't know Natalia, you're missing out! (not just because she's similar to me... but because she's a good friend to have)
Here's Natalia on the left, and Jaime on the right... I should explain them separately... urlLink urlLink

Here's my cousin James playing soccer... I just think this is the most awesome picture... it's sweet!... anyways, that's from when he had a frow... he's my favorite boy cousin (but don't tell anyone)... urlLink urlLink
here's me and Glauco from last year's ISC... I couldn't go this year, which I was very sad about urlLink urlLink
This is me at my friend's house when we were 4 or somethin'... I just thought it was an awesome pic' so I put it up. urlLink urlLink
Here's Fernando... he's from Brasil, and he's one of my best friends in the whole world.... oh yeah, I like his hair in this... someday, I'm going to Brasil... urlLink urlLink

This is my friend Brytt... she lives in Boise, and she's one of my good friends... she's always looking forward to camp (which is the only time we ever see each other), so she asks me in September if I'm excited for camp (which is in July)... it's pretty funny. So, guess what? I get to see her this month, 'cause it's July! party! urlLink urlLink

Alright, folks... most of the stuff below this was my family... now there will still be some family things, but I'm gonna post some pics of my friends, some at home, most are abroad. And if you have a pic' you want me to put up here... just talk to me, and send it to me... I'll be most happy to include you.
I'm thinking... ... Natalia thinks I look very serious... but that's ok... anyways, when I get a real pic to put up here, I'll do that urlLink urlLink
we're just kinda winding down... I love the cold, it makes you look tone... oh yeah, look away, ladies ;)... urlLink urlLink
Here's what I think is one of the coolest pictures, so I put it up here urlLink urlLink
Here... we were kinda broken down... but it's ok now, because we didn't die. This is my little bro, Michael, me, and my big bro, Tim urlLink urlLink
urlLink This is of my cousin, Hannah, the guy she went with, and me and Jessica, the girl I took... it was a lot of fun urlLink
urlLink Before I shaved my head... urlLink
I figure I'll just start putting stuff up here as I can.
